textContent:
2 1/2 ounces dry vermouth, preferably Dolin dry
3/4 ounce London dry gin
2 dashes orange bitters, preferably Regans'
Garnish: olive

Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass, add ice and stir until chilled.
Strain into a coupe and garnish with the olive.

https://punchdrink.com/recipes/astoria
title: Astoria
